message.name: ERR_DECODE_BATCH_PARAM_FAILED
message.locale: The decode of the batch parameters for batch program instance '%1s' failed, as the class for the struct to hold the parameters could not be found, with message '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_INSTANCES_RUNNING
message.locale: There is already an instance of a batch program with instance ID '%1s' running.

message.name: INF_CASE_SKIPPED
message.locale: The processing for the record with '%1s' was skipped, with error message '%2s', and stack trace '%3s'.

message.name: INF_APP_CASES_SKIPPED
message.locale: The following records were skipped due to application errors:

message.name: INF_INFRASTRUCTURE_CASES_SKIPPED
message.locale: The following records were skipped due to infrastructure errors:

message.name: INF_CHUNKING_START
message.locale: Chunking for %1n with chunk size %2n and initial value %3n

message.name: INF_LOCK_REAQQUIRE
message.locale: Reacquire the lock on the chunk for %1s

message.name: INF_LOCK_SKIP
message.locale: Skipping the chunk because of a lock

message.name: INF_BATCH_PROC_REC_LOCKED
message.locale: Record locked on batch process record

message.name: INF_SLEEPING_ALL
message.locale: Sleeping because all the chunks not reached

message.name: INF_SLEEPING_ALL_MAIN
message.locale: Sleeping because all the main chunks not reached

message.name: INF_SLEEPING_LOCKED
message.locale: Sleeping because of locked unprocessed rows

message.name: INF_ERROR_PROCESSING_SKIPPED_CASES
message.locale: *** WARNING SKIPPED RECORDS WERE NOT PROCESSED CORRECTLY ***

message.name: INF_ERROR_PROCESSING_SKIPPED_CASES_DETAILS
message.locale: An exception occurred during the processing of skipped records, with message %1s

message.name: INF_ERROR_GETTING_CHUNK_RESULT
message.locale: *** WARNING DETAILED RESULTS FOR SOME OR ALL OF THE RECORDS PROCESSED ARE UNAVAILABLE ***

message.name: INF_ERROR_GETTING_CHUNK_RESULT_DETAILS
message.locale: An exception occurred during the tabulation of results for some of the records processed, with message %1s

message.name: INF_ERROR_EXTRA_PROCESSING
message.locale: *** WARNING THE EXTRA PROCESSING SPECIFIED FOR THIS BATCH PROGRAM HAS FAILED ***

message.name: INF_ERROR_EXTRA_PROCESSING_DETAILS
message.locale: An exception occurred during the tabulation of results for some of the records processed, with message %1s

message.name: INF_ERROR_SENDING_REPORT
message.locale: *** WARNING THE GENERATION OF THE REPORT FOR THIS BATCH PROGRAM HAS FAILED ***

message.name: INF_ERROR_SENDING_REPORT_DETAILS
message.locale: An exception occurred during the generation of the report for this batch program, with message %1s

message.name: INF_ERROR_ON_COMMIT
message.locale: *** WARNING THE TRANSACTION COMMIT HAS FAILED ***

message.name: INF_ERROR_ON_COMMIT_DETAILS
message.locale: An exception occurred during the transaction commit, with message %1s

message.name: INF_ERROR_ON_ROLLBACK
message.locale: *** WARNING THE TRANSACTION ROLLBACK HAS FAILED ***

message.name: INF_ERROR_ON_ROLLBACK_DETAILS
message.locale: An exception occurred during the transaction rollback, with message %1s
